body: This reminds me with a case near my hometown. A dude working hard in Seoul menwhile his wife is cheating on him until she birthed a baby. That dude got home finding these out and decided to divorce and literally tearing down his house using an excavator. Poor guy, he's being watched by his neighboors during the house tearing and hes just smiling us away, meanwhile we know his heart can't be healed
@YandereWaifu Your not suppose to insert as the cuck, unless your an idiot.

The guy that got cucked is an unappealing old guy and only appears in a few panels. Since the focus is away from him and he doesn't look like a generic male for readers to insert into, an NTR tag would be a little more misleading. This is why the cheating tag is useful
